price: (34) [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician.
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla lil'mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
